definition: to put sb on an intravenous drip
to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from
dozen (loanword)

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items
a drop/to drip

sentences.english: The patient is put on a drip after her operation.
sentences.chinese: 那个病人动过手术后就打点滴。

sentences.english: I was on a drop all the time except when I was sleeping.
sentences.chinese: 除了睡觉的时间外，我一直都在打点滴。

sentences.english: The accident victim was hooked up to a drip administering intravenous fluids.
sentences.chinese: 打点滴，输液，静脉输液治疗法。

sentences.english: Why do not you listen to the arrangements for doctors to drips, ah, ah joke.
sentences.chinese: 你为什么不听医生的安排去打点滴啊，开玩笑啊。

sentences.english: When I was put on a drip, he told me interesting stories to make me happy.
sentences.chinese: 我打点滴的时候，他给我讲有趣的故事让我高兴。
